Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 4; D1: 4; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 2; D7: 2; D8: 1; D9: 1; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: D: 8; W: 6 Spell DC: D: 16; W: 14
Spells:
Animal Friendship (D1 Ench): R30' Target beast(s) convinced of good intent for 1 dy (Wis neg)
Awaken (D5 Tran): Touched beast or plant Int 10, friendly for 30 dy
Beast Sense (D2 Divi): Self use touched beast's senses for conc/1 hr
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ghost hand 1 HP necrotic, undead also Disadv self attack for 1 rd
Conjure Animals (D3 Conj): R60' Summon obedient fey creatures for conc/1 hr
Conjure Fey (D6 Conj): R90' Summon obedient fey for conc/1 hr
Conjure Minor Elementals (D4 Conj): R90' Summon obedient elements for conc/1 hr
Darkvision (D2 Tran): Touched see in dark for 8 hr
Feign Death (D3 Necr): Touched appears dead for 1 hr
Fire Storm (D7 Evoc): R150' Objects in 10 10' cu 7d10 HP (Dex half)
Friends (W0 Ench): Self Adv Cha w/target for conc/1 min
Greater Restoration (D5 Abju): Touched creature unexhaust, uncharm, unpetrify, uncurse, or restored ability or HP
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched +1d4 ability check w/in conc/1 min
Gust Of Wind (D2 Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (Str neg), half movement for conc/1 min
Healing Word (D1 Evoc): R60' Target 1d4+modifier HP
Jump (D1 Tran): Touched jump x3 for 1 min
Poison Spray (D0 Conj): R10' Target 4d12 HP (Con neg)
Polymorph (D4 Tran): R60' Target creature transformed for conc/1 hr/0 HP (Wis neg)
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Hand flame lights 10' radius for 10 min, throw for 4d8 HP
Protection From Energy (D3 Abju): Resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for conc/1 hr
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Target 2d8 HP, poisoned 1 tn (Con not poisoned)
Reverse Gravity (D7 Tran): R50' Items in 50' radius fall up for conc/1 min
Shapechange (D9 Tran): Self polymorph for conc/1 hr/0 HP
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Touched club attack with spell attack, does 1d8 HP for 1 min
Sunburst (D8 Evoc): 60' radius light 12d6 HP (Con half), blind 1 min (Con neg)
Thunderwave (D1 Evoc): 15' cu 2d8 HP, pushed 10' (Con half, no push)
Wall Of Fire (D4 Evoc): R120' 60'x20' wall 5d8 HP (Dex half) for conc/1 min
Wall Of Stone (D5 Evoc): R120' 10 10'x10' panels for conc/10 min
Wall Of Thorns (D6 Conj): R120' 60'x10' wall 7d8 HP (Dex half) for conc/10 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Wizard): 2 cantrips, 1 1st-level/long rest
Archdruid: Unlimited Wild Shape
Balm Of The Summer Court: R120' Distribute 20d6 HP healing and 20 temporary HP to targets 1/long rest
Beast Spells: Cast spells during Wild Shape
Elemental Adept (Cold): Spells ignore cold resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Spells ignore thunder resistance, treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Faithful Summons: 4 creatures summoned for 1 hr when self incapacitated 1/long rest
Guardian Spirit: Summoned creatures w/in Spirit Totem aura heal 10 HP
Hearth Of Moonlight And Shadow: 30' radius total cover, +5 Dex (Stealth) and Wis (Perception) during rest
Hidden Paths: Teleport self 60', willing touched 30' 2/long rest
Mighty Summoner: Summoned creatures +2 HP/HD, attacks are magical
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Spirit Totem (Bear): R60' Targets in 30' radius 25 temporary HP, Adv Str for 1 min 1/short rest
Spirit Totem (Hawk): R60' Targets in 30' radius Adv attack and Wis (Perception) for 1 min 1/short rest
Spirit Totem (Unicorn): R60' Allies Adv to detect creatures in 30' for 1 min, targets heal 20 HP 1/short rest
Walker In Dreams: After short rest, cast Dream, Scrying, or Teleportation Circle connected to last long rest place 1/long rest
Wild Shape: Transform into CR 1 creature for 10 hr 2/short rest
Notes
* Ability Boosts: +1 Constitution
